  • Method Details

    • startSale

      public void startSale()
      Creates a clean object that can be used for the sale. This mean null states on all current items, discounts and receipts. A new cart and new sale log. Lastly connections to the different databases.

    • scanItem

      public void scanItem(int itemID)
      Gets item scanned from inventory and adds it to the cart.
      Parameters:
      itemID - Number used to find the correct item.

    • scanItem

      public void scanItem(int itemID, int amount)
      Gets item scanned from inventory and adds the specified amount of it to the cart.
      Parameters:
      itemID - Number used to find the correct item.
      amount - Number of items that should be added to the list.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(int itemID)
      Removes the specified item from the cart.
      Parameters:
      itemID - Number which identifies item.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(int itemID, int amount)
      Removes a specified amount of an item from the cart.
      Parameters:
      itemID - Number used to find the item.
      amount - Number of the item that should be taken away.

    • retrieveDiscount

      public void retrieveDiscount(int customerID)
      Gets applicable discounts to the purchase.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID related to the member.

    • pay

      public void pay(double paidAmount)
      Completes the purchase by calculating the change, creating a receipt, printing it and storing the information in the log.
      Parameters:
      paidAmount - The amount of money given to the cashier by the customer.

      public Cart getCart()

      Prints the current state of the cart.
